Definition: Fixed limit on new capacity addition of the technology. Same as bdc_fx.
Minimum new capacity addition of the technology. Same as bdc_lo.
Maximum new capacity addition of the technology. Same as bdc_up.
Fixed limit on total installed capacity of the technology. Same as bdi_fx.
Minimum total installed capacity of the technology. Same as bdi_lo.
Maximum total installed capacity of the technology. Same as bdi_up.
